name: Extended Unix Code File
summary: An EUC file is a text file format (Extended Unix Code) used for encoding Japanese Kanji characters along with other East Asian scripts, such as Korean and simplified Chinese. EUC encoding allows computers and software systems to correctly display and process Japanese, Korean, and simplified Chinese text, making it especially useful for applications that handle multilingual text data in Unix-based systems.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
